options.content:
## **This is an HTTP dashboard of your application's statistics. Select the namespace for your product.**
#### **If you need a dashboard with cluster metrics, follow the [link](https://grafana-customer.apps.lmru.tech/d/Gec4gLhVz/cluster-metrics?orgId=1&refresh=30s)**.

targets.expr: sum by (status_group) (label_replace(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$Namespace", service=~"$Service", uri=~"$UriIncome"}[1m]), "status_group", "${1}xx", "status", "([0-9])..")) / scalar(sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$Namespace", service=~"$Service", uri=~"$UriIncome"}[1m]))) > 0
sum by (method, status, uri) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$Namespace", service=~"$Service", client_name=~"$ClientName"}[1m])) > 0
sum by (client_name, method, status, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}[$__range])) > 0
sum by (client_name, method, status, uri) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace=~"$Namespace", service=~"$Service"}[$__range])) > 0
